title: How to Make American Style Corn Dogs

steps.headline: Get your sausage and get any moisture off it on a paper towel
Put a wooden cocktail stick through the middle.
Now get a bowl and put your self raising flour, cornmeal,milk,egg, and seasoning into it.
Mix it until you get a thick batter.
steps.description: You want it thick. If it is too thin add more flour.

steps.headline: Pour your batter into a long cup
Dip the sausage into it,  getting any excess off  by twisting and turning it.
Put into your oil for frying.
steps.description: Ensure sure that  oil is hot enough by putting in a tiny bit of bread. If it goes golden brown it is ready.

steps.headline: Fry for 2-3 minutes or until crisp.
Put corn dogs on paper towel to get any excess oil off.
They are now ready for serving.

text: Get your sausage and get any moisture off it on a paper towel  Put a wooden cocktail stick through the middle. (optional) Now get a bowl and put your self raising flour, cornmeal,milk,egg, and seasoning into it.  Mix it until you get a thick batter. You want it thick. If it is too thin add more flour. Pour your batter into a long cup  Dip the sausage into it,  getting any excess off  by twisting and turning it.  Put into your oil for frying. Ensure sure that  oil is hot enough by putting in a tiny bit of bread. If it goes golden brown it is ready. Fry for 2-3 minutes or until crisp.  Put corn dogs on paper towel to get any excess oil off.  They are now ready for serving.
